Name: aluminium sulfate production, powder | aluminium sulfate, powder | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: Data based on the information from one European producer. The inventory is based on a filled in questionnaire.
